item.title: Insights from AISI, OpenAI, and The Future Society
item.description: This is a linkpost to my substack post summarising my time at an AI Safety networking event, with a discussion panel with people from AISI, OpenAI and The Future Society.

item.title: Creating this new website
item.description:
This post explains the steps I took to create this new website.

Resources used:

  • https://swe-to-mle.pages.dev/posts/learn-in-public/
  • https://gokarna-hugo.netlify.app/posts/theme-documentation-basics

Steps

  • Set up hugo and the theme

    • brew install hugo
    • hugo new site website
    • git submodule add https://github.com/526avijitgupta/gokarna.git themes/gokarna
    • Copy the example config file from gokarna docs into hugo.toml

  • Create blogpost

    • hugo new posts/new-website/index.md.
    • Then write this blogpost! This is done in parallel with the remaining steps.

  • Test locally

    • hugo serve
    • open http://localhost:1313

  • Push to GitHub
